summary: A replacement mesh for the funky Dawnguard Dragonbone Arrow
descriptionHtml:
Just the other day, I saw a mod where someone had replaced the crappy dragonbone arrow model with the steel arrow model.

I liked the idea, but I thought the dragonbone arrow should be much different.
After much trial and error getting the model to work in Skyrim, I present my interpretation.

Version 2 uses the fixed arrow.nif from the UDGP.

Dawnguard is required. I repeat, DAWNGUARD IS REQUIRED!
These are meshes only. No textures, no esp.
author: Aellis

files.name: Dragonbone Arrow Replacer
files.changelogHtml: Replaced vanilla arrow.nif with the fixed UDGP nif.
